item.title: Mass blackouts in storm-hit eastern Australia
item.description: Residents are warned power may not return for days as further heavy rainfall is forecast.

item.title: Watch: Man survives being run over by train
item.description: Surveillance footage shows the man standing up and walking away after the incident in Lima.

item.title: Israeli tourist and homestay host gang-raped in India, police say
item.description: The two women were reportedly stargazing with three male tourists near a lake in Hampi, Karnataka, when they were attacked.

item.title: Bah√≠a Blanca: Residents flee homes in flooded Argentine city
item.description: Torrential rain has forced more than 1,200 residents to leave their homes.

item.title: How Trump's threats have brought Canada's Liberals back from the dead
item.description: Justin Trudeau's party was headed for near-certain defeat. That is until Trump's tariffs came, upending the face of Canadian politics.
